description.english: Finish A Dream of Aaru in Road to Gehenna.
description.german: Schließe in Road to Gehenna „Ein Traum von Aaru“ ab.
description.french: Terminez le Songe d'Ialou dans Road to Gehenna.
description.koreana: 게헨나로 가는 길에서 아아루의 꿈을 완료하세요.
description.spanish: Finaliza «Un sueño de Aaru» en Road to Gehenna.
description.schinese: 在《地狱之路》完整游玩“雅卢之梦”。
description.tchinese: 在《地獄之路》完整遊玩「雅盧之夢」。
description.russian: Завершите «Сон об Иару» в Road to Gehenna.
description.japanese: 「アアルの夢」を完了する。 (ゲヘナに続く道)
description.polish: Ukończ „Sen o Aaru” w Drodze do Gehenny.
description.turkish: Road to Gehenna'da Aaru Rüyası'nı bitir.
description.brazilian: Termine "Um Sonho de Aaru" em Road to Gehenna.

description.english: Listen to all she has to say.
description.german: Hör dir alles an, was sie zu sagen hat.
description.french: Écoutez tout ce qu'elle a à dire.
description.spanish: Escucha todo lo que tiene que decirte.
description.schinese: 听她把话说完。
description.tchinese: 聽她把話說完。
description.russian: Выслушайте всё, что она скажет.
description.japanese: 彼女の話をすべて聞く。
description.polish: Wysłuchaj wszystkiego, co ma do powiedzenia.
description.brazilian: Ouça tudo que ela tem a dizer.

description.english: Ascend the tower in In the Beginning.
description.german: Steige in In the Beginning den Turm hinauf.
description.french: Gravissez la tour dans In the Beginning.
description.spanish: Asciende por la torre en In the Beginning.
description.schinese: 在《开端》登上高塔。
description.tchinese: 在《開端》登上高塔。
description.russian: Поднимитесь на Башню в In the Beginning.
description.japanese: 塔を登る。 (ビギニング)
description.polish: Wejdź na wieżę w Na początku.
description.brazilian: Suba na torre em In the Beginning.

description.english: Finish Farewell Atlantis in Road to Gehenna.
description.german: Schließe in Road to Gehenna „Abschied von Atlantis“ ab.
description.french: Terminez l'Adieu à l'Atlantide dans Road to Gehenna.
description.koreana: 게헨나로 가는 길에서 아틀란티스여 안녕히를 완료하세요.
description.spanish: Finaliza «Adiós, Atlántida» en Road to Gehenna.
description.schinese: 在《地狱之路》完整游玩“永别了，亚特兰蒂斯”。
description.tchinese: 在《地獄之路》完整遊玩「永別了，亞特蘭提斯」。
description.russian: Завершите «Прощай, Атлантида» в Road to Gehenna.
description.japanese: 「さらばアトランティス」を完了する。 (ゲヘナに続く道)
description.polish: Ukończ „Żegnaj, Atlantydo” w Drodze do Gehenny.
description.turkish: Road to Gehenna'da Elveda Atlantis'i bitir.
description.brazilian: Termine "Adeus, Atlântida" em Road to Gehenna.

description.english: Initiate the ascension process in Road to Gehenna.
description.german: Leite in Road to Gehenna den Vorgang des Auffahrens ein.
description.french: Entamez l'Ascension dans Road to Gehenna.
description.koreana: 게헨나로 가는 길에서 승천 프로세스를 실행하세요.
description.spanish: Inicia el proceso de ascensión en Road to Gehenna.
description.schinese: 在《地狱之路》启动飞升进程。
description.tchinese: 在《地獄之路》啟動崛升程序。
description.russian: Запустите процесс вознесения в Road to Gehenna.
description.japanese: 昇天プロセスを開始する。 (ゲヘナに続く道)
description.polish: Rozpocznij proces wniebowstąpienia w Drodze do Gehenny.
description.turkish: Road to Gehenna'da yükseliş sürecini başlat.
description.brazilian: Inicie o processo de ascensão em Road to Gehenna.

description.english: Solve every mystery in every land, that you might aid those who walk in your footsteps.
description.german: Löse jedes Rätsel in jedem Land, damit du denen helfen kannst, die in deinen Fußstapfen wandeln.
description.french: Résolvez chaque mystère de chaque monde, afin d'aider vos successeurs.
description.koreana: 모든 땅의 모든 수수께끼를 해결하여, 당신의 발자취를 따르는 이들을 도울 여지를 만드세요.
description.spanish: Resuelve todos los misterios de todas las tierras para ayudar a quienes siguen tus pasos.
description.schinese: 解开每个区域中的所有谜题，或许可为后来者提供帮助。
description.tchinese: 解開每個區域中的所有謎題，或許可為後人提供幫助。
description.russian: Решите все загадки во всех землях, чтобы помочь своим последователям.
description.japanese: すべての土地の謎を一つ残さず解けば、後を継ぐ者たちを手助けできるかもしれない。
description.polish: Rozwiąż każdą tajemnicę w każdej krainie, aby pomóc tym, którzy idą po twoich śladach.
description.turkish: Tüm diyarlardaki gizemleri çöz, senin izinden yürüyenlere yardımcı ol.
description.brazilian: Solucione todos os mistérios em todas as terras para ajudar quem virá depois de você.

description.english: That's what axes are for!
description.german: Dafür sind Äxte da!
description.french: C'est à ça que servent les haches !
description.koreana: 도끼는 이런 데 쓰라고 있는 거죠!
description.spanish: ¡Para eso están las hachas!
description.schinese: 斧子就是干这个用的！
description.tchinese: 斧頭就是這麼用的！
description.russian: Вот для чего нужны топоры!
description.japanese: 斧はこのためにあるのだ！
description.brazilian: Machados servem para isso!

description.english: Strike a deal.
description.german: Triff eine Abmachung.
description.french: Concluez un marché.
description.spanish: Haz un trato.
description.schinese: 达成协议。
description.tchinese: 達成協議。
description.russian: Заключите сделку.
description.japanese: 取引に合意する。
description.brazilian: Faça um acordo.

description.english: It's not for everyone!
description.german: Dafür ist nicht jeder gemacht!
description.french: C'est pas donné à tout le monde !
description.spanish: ¡No es para todo el mundo!
description.schinese: 并非人人可进！
description.tchinese: 並非人人可進！
description.russian: Она не для всех!
description.japanese: 誰もが得られるものではない！
description.brazilian: Não é para todos!

description.english: Solve fifteen puzzles in In the Beginning.
description.german: Löse in In the Beginning fünfzehn Rätsel.
description.french: Résolvez quinze énigmes dans In the Beginning.
description.spanish: Resuelve 15 puzles en In the Beginning.
description.schinese: 在《开端》解开 15 个谜题。
description.tchinese: 在《開端》解開 15 個謎題。
description.russian: Решите пятнадцать загадок в In the Beginning.
description.japanese: パズルを15個解く。 (ビギニング)
description.turkish: In the Beginning'de on beş bulmaca çöz.
description.brazilian: Solucione 15 quebra-cabeças em In the Beginning.

description.english: Free Garrett in Road to Gehenna.
description.german: Befreie Garrett in Road to Gehenna.
description.french: Libérez Garret dans Road to Gehenna.
description.spanish: Libera a Garret en Road to Gehenna.
description.schinese: 在《地狱之路》释放盖瑞特。
description.tchinese: 在《地獄之路》釋放蓋瑞特。
description.russian: Освободите «Гарретта» в Road to Gehenna.
description.japanese: ギャレットを解放する。 (ゲヘナに続く道)
description.polish: Uwolnij Garretta w Drodze do Gehenny.
description.brazilian: Liberte Garrett em Road to Gehenna.

description.english: Finish Underwater Knight Quest in Road to Gehenna.
description.german: Schließe in Road to Gehenna „Unterwasser-Ritter-Abenteuer“ ab.
description.french: Terminez la Quête du chevalier sous la mer dans Road to Gehenna.
description.koreana: 게헨나로 가는 길에서 수중 기사의 모험을 완료하세요.
description.spanish: Finaliza «La búsqueda del caballero submarino» en Road to Gehenna.
description.schinese: 在《地狱之路》完整游玩“海底骑士物语”。
description.tchinese: 在《地獄之路》完整遊玩「海底騎士物語」。
description.russian: Завершите «Квест о подводном рыцаре» в Road to Gehenna.
description.japanese: 「水中騎士の冒険」を完了する。 (ゲヘナに続く道)
description.polish: Ukończ „Misję podwodnego rycerza” w Drodze do Gehenny.
description.turkish: Road to Gehenna'da Su Altı Şövalye Macerası'nı bitir.
description.brazilian: Termine "Missão do Cavaleiro Subaquático" em Road to Gehenna.

description.english: Rescue Admin from his prison cell in Road to Gehenna.
description.german: Rette Admin in Road to Gehenna aus seiner Gefängniszelle.
description.french: Délivrez Admin de sa cellule de prison dans Road to Gehenna.
description.koreana: 게헨나로 가는 길에서 관리자를 독방에서 구출하세요.
description.spanish: Rescata a Administrador de su celda en Road to Gehenna.
description.schinese: 在《地狱之路》救出牢房中的管理员。
description.tchinese: 在《地獄之路》從牢房中救出管理員。
description.russian: Освободите администратора из тюремной камеры в Road to Gehenna.
description.japanese: 管理者を檻から解放する。 (ゲヘナに続く道)
description.polish: Uwolnij administratora z więzienia w Drodze do Gehenny.
description.turkish: Road to Gehenna'da Admin'i hapishane hücresinden kurtar.
description.brazilian: Resgate o Admin da prisão em Road to Gehenna.

description.english: Bring the end of your generations.
description.german: Führe das Ende deiner Linie herbei.
description.french: Marquez la fin de vos générations.
description.spanish: Pon punto final a tu descendencia.
description.schinese: 打破循环。
description.tchinese: 打破迴圈。
description.russian: Принесите погибель роду своему.
description.japanese: 自分の世代に終わりをもたらす。
description.brazilian: Traga o fim às suas gerações.

description.english: Perform above average in Prisoner's Dilemma in Road to Gehenna.
description.german: Erziele in Road to Gehenna überdurchschnittliche Leistungen im Gefangenendilemma.
description.french: Obtenez un résultat supérieur à la moyenne au Dilemme du prisonnier dans Road to Gehenna.
description.koreana: 게헨나로 가는 길에서 죄수의 딜레마 실험에서 평균 이상의 성적을 내세요.
description.spanish: Puntúa por encima de la media en «Dilema del prisionero», en Road to Gehenna.
description.schinese: 在《地狱之路》的“囚徒困境”实验中发挥亮眼表现。
description.tchinese: 在《地獄之路》的「囚徒困境」實驗中表現超過平均水準。
description.russian: Покажите результат выше среднего в «Дилемме заключённого» в Road to Gehenna.
description.japanese: 「囚人のジレンマ」で平均以上の結果を残す。 (ゲヘナに続く道)
description.polish: Osiągnij ponadprzeciętny wynik w „Dylemacie więźnia” w Drodze do Gehenny.
description.turkish: Road to Gehenna'da Tutsak İkilemi'nde ortalamanın üstünde performans göster.
description.brazilian: Tenha um desempenho acima da média no "Dilema do Prisioneiro" em Road to Gehenna.

description.english: Enter Elohim's temple.
description.german: Betritt Elohims Tempel.
description.french: Entrez dans le temple d'Elohim.
description.spanish: Entra en el templo de Elohim.
description.schinese: 进入埃洛希姆的圣殿。
description.tchinese: 進入埃洛希姆的聖殿。
description.russian: Войдите в храм Элохима.
description.japanese: エロヒムの神殿へ入る。
description.brazilian: Entre no templo de Elohim.

description.english: Find a recording in In the Beginning.
description.german: Finde in In the Beginning eine Aufnahme.
description.french: Trouvez un enregistrement dans In the Beginning.
description.spanish: Halla una grabación en In the Beginning.
description.schinese: 在《开端》找到 1 个纪录。
description.tchinese: 在《開端》找到 1 個紀錄。
description.russian: Найдите запись в In the Beginning.
description.japanese: 記録音声を見つける。 (ビギニング)
description.turkish: In the Beginning'de bir kayıt bul.
description.brazilian: Encontre uma gravação em In the Beginning.

description.english: Reach one of Elohim's messengers.
description.german: Erreiche einen von Elohims Boten.
description.french: Atteignez l'un des messagers d'Elohim.
description.spanish: Llega hasta uno de los Mensajeros de Elohim.
description.schinese: 与 1 名埃洛希姆信使取得联系。
description.tchinese: 與 1 名埃洛希姆的信使取得聯繫。
description.russian: Установите контакт с одним из посланников Элохима.
description.japanese: エロヒムの使者のひとりと会う。
description.polish: Dotrzyj do jednego z posłańców Elohima.
description.brazilian: Encontre um dos mensageiros de Elohim.

description.english: Vote for an artist in the Art Gallery in Road to Gehenna.
description.german: Stimme in Road to Gehenna für einen Künstler in der Galerie.
description.french: Votez pour un artiste dans la Galerie d'art dans Road to Gehenna.
description.koreana: 게헨나로 가는 길에서 미술 전시회에서 작가 한 명에게 투표하세요.
description.spanish: Vota por un artista en la galería de arte en Road to Gehenna.
description.schinese: 在《地狱之路》的画廊里为艺术家投票。
description.tchinese: 在《地獄之路》的畫廊裡為藝術家投票。
description.russian: Проголосуйте за художника в галерее искусств в Road to Gehenna.
description.japanese: アートギャラリーのアートに票を入れる。 (ゲヘナに続く道)
description.polish: Zagłosuj na twórcę w galerii sztuki w Drodze do Gehenny.
description.turkish: Road to Gehenna'da Sanat Galerisi'nde bir sanatçıyı oyla.
description.brazilian: Vote em um artista na galeria de arte em Road to Gehenna.

description.english: Search for other lands.
description.german: Suche nach anderen Ländern.
description.french: Cherchez d'autres mondes.
description.spanish: Busca otras tierras.
description.schinese: 寻找其他区域。
description.tchinese: 尋找其他區域。
description.russian: Найдите другие земли.
description.japanese: 他の土地を探しに出る。
description.brazilian: Procure outras terras.

description.english: Solve one puzzle in In the Beginning.
description.german: Löse in In the Beginning ein Rätsel.
description.french: Résolvez une énigme dans In the Beginning.
description.spanish: Resuelve un puzle en In the Beginning.
description.schinese: 在《开端》解开 1 个谜题。
description.tchinese: 在《開端》解開 1 個謎題。
description.russian: Решите одну загадку в In the Beginning.
description.japanese: パズルを１個解く。 (ビギニング)
description.polish: Rozwiąż jedną zagadkę w Na początku.
description.turkish: In the Beginning'de bir bulmaca çöz.
description.brazilian: Solucione um quebra-cabeça em In the Beginning.

description.english: Run the sand through your robot hands.
description.german: Lass den Sand durch deine Roboterhände rinnen.
description.french: Saisissez du sable dans vos mains robotiques.
description.spanish: Siente la arena en tus circuitos robóticos.
description.schinese: 沙子从你的机械手指缝间流下。
description.tchinese: 讓沙子從你的機械手指縫間流下。
description.russian: Пропустите песок через свои механические руки.
description.japanese: 機械の手で砂を握る。
description.polish: Przesiej piach przez swoje robotyczne palce.
description.brazilian: Sinta a areia passar pelas suas mãos robóticas.

description.english: Enter the Land of Faith.
description.german: Betritt das Land des Glaubens.
description.french: Accédez à la Terre de Foi.
description.spanish: Entra en la tierra de fe.
description.schinese: 进入信仰之地。
description.tchinese: 進入信仰之地。
description.russian: Ступите на Землю веры.
description.japanese: 信仰の国に入る。
description.brazilian: Entre na Terra da Fé.

description.english: Tell the others what you think.
description.german: Sag den anderen, was du denkst.
description.french: Partagez vos pensées avec les autres.
description.spanish: Dales tu opinión a los demás.
description.schinese: 告诉其他人你的想法。
description.tchinese: 告訴其他人你的想法。
description.russian: Выскажите остальным своё мнение.
description.japanese: 自分の考えを他者に伝える。
description.brazilian: Diga aos outros o que você pensa.

description.english: Pass the initial checks.
description.german: Bestehe die ersten Prüfungen.
description.french: Réussissez les vérifications initiales.
description.spanish: Supera las comprobaciones iniciales.
description.schinese: 完成初始教程。
description.tchinese: 完成初始教學。
description.russian: Пройдите первичную проверку.
description.japanese: 初期チェックを完了する。
description.brazilian: Passe nas verificações iniciais.

description.english: Laugh at the pointlessness of existence.
description.german: Lache über die Sinnlosigkeit der Existenz.
description.french: Riez de la vacuité de l'existence.
description.spanish: Ríete ante la futilidad de la existencia.
description.schinese: 嘲笑存在毫无意义。
description.tchinese: 嘲笑存在毫無意義。
description.russian: Посмейтесь над бессмысленностью бытия.
description.japanese: 存在の無意味さを笑う。
description.brazilian: Ria da inutilidade da existência.

description.english: Use the connectors to win a prize!
description.german: Nutze die Konnektoren, um einen Preis zu gewinnen!
description.french: Utilisez les connecteurs pour remporter un prix !
description.spanish: ¡Usa los conectores para ganar un premio!
description.schinese: 使用连接器解开谜题取得奖励！
description.tchinese: 使用連接器解開謎題取得獎勵！
description.russian: Получите награду с помощью коннекторов!
description.japanese: コネクターを使って目標を達成する！
description.brazilian: Use os conectores para ganhar um prêmio!

description.english: ...but let's be honest, it works the same.
description.german: … aber seien wir mal ehrlich, es funktioniert genauso.
description.french: ... mais franchement, ça fonctionne pareil.
description.spanish: Pero funciona igual, para qué negarlo.
description.schinese: 管它正不正，用起来都一样。
description.tchinese: 管它正不正，用起來都一樣。
description.russian: ...но, если честно, работает точно так же.
description.japanese: …正直なところ、機能は同じである。
description.turkish: Dürüst olalım, pek de fark etmiyor.
description.brazilian: ... Mas, sinceramente, funciona do mesmo jeito.

description.english: A little curiosity never killed the cat.
description.german: Ein bisschen Neugier hat noch niemandem geschadet.
description.french: La curiosité n'est pas un si vilain défaut.
description.koreana: 작은 호기심은 고양이를 죽이지 않는 법입니다.
description.spanish: Un pelín de curiosidad nunca mató al gato.
description.schinese: 好奇害死猫，少一点就还好。
description.tchinese: 一點點好奇心並不會害死貓。
description.russian: На самом деле любопытство — не порок.
description.japanese: 少しぐらい好奇心を出しても死にはしない。
description.polish: Odrobina ciekawości to nie jest pierwszy stopień do piekła.
description.brazilian: Um pouquinho de curiosidade nunca matou ninguém.

description.english: Reach the top.
description.german: Erreiche die Spitze.
description.french: Atteignez le sommet.
description.spanish: Alcanza lo alto de la torre.
description.schinese: 上至顶层。
description.tchinese: 上至頂層。
description.russian: Доберитесь до вершины.
description.japanese: 頂上まで登る。
description.brazilian: Chegue ao topo.

description.english: Stand on your own two shoulders.
description.german: Steh auf deinen eigenen zwei Schultern.
description.french: Grimpez sur vos propres épaules.
description.spanish: Tú te lo guisas, tú te lo comes.
description.schinese: 上面的风景更好。
description.tchinese: 自食其力，步步高升。
description.russian: Встаньте на свои же плечи.
description.japanese: 自分自身を肩車する。
description.brazilian: Fique sobre seus próprios ombros.

displayName.french: Le serpent qui se mord la queue

description.english: Expose the flaws in the code.
description.german: Lege die Fehler im Code offen.
description.french: Révélez les lacunes du code.
description.spanish: Expón los errores del código.
description.schinese: 揭示代码的缺陷。
description.tchinese: 揭示代碼的缺陷。
description.russian: Найдите изъяны в программном коде.
description.japanese: コードの欠陥を暴く。
description.brazilian: Exponha as falhas no código.

description.english: See what the others have to say.
description.german: Schau, was die anderen zu sagen haben.
description.french: Lisez ce que les autres ont à dire.
description.spanish: A ver qué se cuenta la gente.
description.schinese: 看看其他人说了些什么。
description.tchinese: 看看其他人說了些什麼。
description.russian: Узнайте, о чём говорят другие.
description.japanese: 他者の意見を聞いてみる。
description.polish: Sprawdź, co mają do powiedzenia inni.
description.brazilian: Veja o que os outros têm a dizer.

description.english: Find a Messenger's abode.
description.german: Finde das Domizil eines Boten.
description.french: Trouvez la demeure d'un messager.
description.spanish: Halla la morada de un mensajero.
description.schinese: 找到 1 名信使所在之处。
description.tchinese: 找到 1 名信使所在之處。
description.russian: Найдите обитель посланника.
description.japanese: 使者の住処を見つける。
description.brazilian: Encontre a morada de um mensageiro.

description.english: Successfully engage in co-op mode with yourself.
description.german: Spiele erfolgreich im Koop-Modus mit dir selbst.
description.french: Entamez un mode coop avec vous-même.
description.koreana: 자기 자신과 성공적으로 협동 모드를 수행하세요.
description.spanish: Juega contigo mismo con éxito en el modo cooperativo.
description.schinese: 自己与自己合作解开谜题。
description.tchinese: 與自己合作解開謎題。
description.russian: Успешно поиграйте в совместном режиме с собой.
description.japanese: 自分自身との協力に成功する。
description.polish: Zagraj tylko ze sobą w trybie kooperacji.
description.turkish: Başarılı bir şekilde kendinle iş birliği moduna gir.
description.brazilian: Participe com sucesso do modo cooperativo consigo.

displayName.japanese: 印章だけでは物足りない

description.english: Pick up a star.
description.german: Nimm einen Stern auf.
description.french: Ramassez une étoile.
description.spanish: Recoge una estrella.
description.schinese: 收集 1 颗星星。
description.tchinese: 收集 1 顆星星。
description.russian: Подберите звезду.
description.japanese: スターを１個手に入れる。
description.brazilian: Pegue uma estrela.

displayName.japanese: 蛇に疑念を吹き込まれないようにする。

description.english: Do not allow the serpent to fill you with doubt.
description.german: Lass nicht zu, dass die Schlange dich mit Zweifeln erfüllt.
description.french: Ne laissez pas le serpent vous emplir de doutes.
description.koreana: 뱀이 의심의 씨앗을 심게끔 놔두지 마세요.
description.spanish: No permitas que la serpiente te haga dudar.
description.schinese: 不要让蛇动摇你的信念。
description.tchinese: 不要讓蛇動搖你的信念。
description.russian: Не дайте змию заронить в вас сомнения.
description.japanese: 蛇を黙らせろ
description.polish: Nie pozwól, by wąż wzbudził w tobie wątpliwości.
description.turkish: Yılanın seni şüpheye düşürmesine izin verme.
description.brazilian: Não permita que a serpente encha você de incertezas.

description.english: Solve five puzzles in In the Beginning.
description.german: Löse in In the Beginning fünf Rätsel.
description.french: Résolvez cinq énigmes dans In the Beginning.
description.spanish: Resuelve 5 puzles en In the Beginning.
description.schinese: 在《开端》解开 5 个谜题。
description.tchinese: 在《開端》解開 5 個謎題。
description.russian: Решите пять загадок в In the Beginning.
description.japanese: パズルを５個解く。 (ビギニング)
description.polish: Rozwiąż pięć zagadek w Na początku.
description.turkish: In the Beginning'de beş bulmaca çöz.
description.brazilian: Solucione cinco quebra-cabeças em In the Beginning.

description.english: Communicate with your double.
description.german: Kommuniziere mit deinem Doppelgänger.
description.french: Communiquez avec votre double.
description.spanish: Comunícate con tu doble.
description.schinese: 与自己的分身交流。
description.tchinese: 與自己的分身交流。
description.russian: Пообщайтесь со своим двойником.
description.japanese: 自分の分身と意思疎通する。
description.brazilian: Comunique-se com a sua cópia.

description.english: Internalise the voice of doubt.
description.german: Verinnerliche die Stimme des Zweifels.
description.french: Intériorisez la voix du doute.
description.spanish: Interioriza la voz de la duda.
description.schinese: 与那个怀疑的声音融合。
description.tchinese: 與那個懷疑的聲音融合。
description.russian: Пригрейте голос сомнения на груди.
description.japanese: 疑いの声を取り入れる。
description.brazilian: Internalize a voz da incerteza.

description.english: Leave a message in In the Beginning.
description.german: Hinterlasse in In the Beginning eine Nachricht.
description.french: Laissez un message dans In the Beginning.
description.spanish: Deja un mensaje en In the Beginning.
description.schinese: 在《开端》留一条信息。
description.tchinese: 在《開端》留下一則訊息。
description.russian: Оставьте послание в In the Beginning.
description.japanese: メッセージを残す。 (ビギニング)
description.turkish: In the Beginning'de bir mesaj bırak.
description.brazilian: Deixe uma mensagem em In the Beginning.

description.english: Collect all pieces of written information.
description.german: Sammle alle schriftlichen Informationen.
description.french: Récupérez toutes les informations écrites.
description.koreana: 글로 적혀 있는 정보를 모두 수집하세요.
description.spanish: Reúne todos los textos de los terminales.
description.schinese: 收集所有的文本信息。
description.tchinese: 收集所有文字資訊。
description.russian: Соберите все письменные материалы.
description.japanese: 文字として残された情報をすべて集める。
description.brazilian: Colete todas as partes das informações escritas.

description.english: Reach all of Elohim's messengers.
description.german: Erreiche alle von Elohims Boten.
description.french: Atteignez tous les messagers d'Elohim.
description.spanish: Contacta con todos los Mensajeros de Elohim.
description.schinese: 与所有的埃洛希姆信使取得联系。
description.tchinese: 與所有埃洛希姆的信使取得聯繫。
description.russian: Установите контакт со всеми посланниками Элохима.
description.japanese: エロヒムの使者全員と会う。
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os mensageiros de Elohim.

description.english: Collect 30 stars.
description.german: Sammle 30 Sterne.
description.french: Récupérez 30 étoiles.
description.spanish: Recoge 30 estrellas.
description.schinese: 收集 30 颗星星。
description.tchinese: 收集 30 顆星星。
description.russian: Соберите 30 звёзд.
description.japanese: スターを30個集める。
description.brazilian: Colete 30 estrelas.

displayName.japanese: エルサレムへ向かって

description.english: Find and finish a lost work of interactive fiction in Road to Gehenna.
description.german: Finde in Road to Gehenna ein verlorenes Werk einer interaktiven Geschichte und schließe es ab.
description.french: Trouvez et achevez une œuvre perdue de fiction interactive dans Road to Gehenna.
description.koreana: 게헨나로 가는 길에서 소실된 인터랙티브 픽션 작품을 찾아내고 완료하세요.
description.spanish: Halla una obra perdida de ficción interactiva y acábala en Road to Gehenna.
description.schinese: 在《地狱之路》找到并完整游玩一部失传的交互式小说。
description.tchinese: 在《地獄之路》找到並完整遊玩一部失傳的互動式小說。
description.russian: Найдите и закончите потерянное произведение в жанре интерактивной фантастики в Road to Gehenna.
description.japanese: 失われたインタラクティブフィクションを見つけ、最後まで進める。 (ゲヘナに続く道)
description.polish: Znajdź i dokończ zaginione dzieło interaktywnej fikcji w Drodze do Gehenny.
description.turkish: Road to Gehenna'da kayıp bir etkileşimli kurgu eserini bul ve tamamla.
description.brazilian: Encontre e finalize uma obra perdida de ficção interativa em Road to Gehenna.

description.english: Don't just peek. Do it.
description.german: Guck nicht nur. Tu es!
description.french: Ne vous contentez pas de jeter un œil. Allez-y.
description.spanish: No te quedes mirando. Hazlo.
description.schinese: 不要畏畏缩缩，大胆行动。
description.tchinese: 不要畏畏縮縮，大膽行動。
description.russian: Не смотрите, а действуйте.
description.japanese: 覗くだけでなく、行動する。
description.brazilian: Não fique só olhando. Faça.

description.english: Use the power of air to your advantage.
description.german: Nutze die Kraft der Luft zu deinem Vorteil.
description.french: Utilisez le pouvoir de l'air à votre avantage.
description.spanish: Usa la potencia del aire a tu favor.
description.schinese: 学会利用风的力量。
description.tchinese: 學會利用風的力量。
description.russian: Используйте поток воздуха себе во благо.
description.japanese: 風の力をうまく利用する。
description.polish: Wykorzystaj moc powietrza na swoją korzyść.
description.brazilian: Use o poder do ar em seu favor.

description.english: Get your user profile in Road to Gehenna.
description.german: Hol dir in Road to Gehenna dein Benutzerprofil.
description.french: Obtenez votre profil utilisateur dans Road to Gehenna.
description.koreana: 게헨나로 가는 길에서 이용자 프로필을 얻으세요.
description.spanish: Consigue un perfil de usuario en Road to Gehenna.
description.schinese: 在《地狱之路》创建你的个人档案。
description.tchinese: 在《地獄之路》建立使用者個人檔案。
description.russian: Заведите профиль пользователя в Road to Gehenna.
description.japanese: 自分のユーザープロファイルを作る。 (ゲヘナに続く道)
description.polish: Stwórz profil użytkownika w Drodze do Gehenny.
description.turkish: Road to Gehenna'da kullanıcı profili edin.
description.brazilian: Crie seu perfil de usuário em Road to Gehenna.
